rooms.name: The 'Grate' Entrance
rooms.longDesc: You stand before a gaping cave mouth that resembles a hungry maw. A warm, humid breeze wafts out from the darkness, carrying a scent that is equal parts mouth-watering and eye-watering. Crude torches sputter on the walls, illuminating a jagged sign painted in what looks hopefully like tomato sauce.

details.desc: The sign reads in sloppy common: 'GRATE CHEFS ENTER HER. DO NOT EAT THE GUESTS.'
It smells of burnt toast, swamp muck, and heavily spiced rat meat.
You hear the distant clanging of pots and high-pitched yipping.
A dark, jagged opening in the rock that feels ominously like the entrance to a giant's stomach.
A thick, moist draft that pushes out from the interior, making the air feel heavy and tropical.
A pungent, overwhelming aroma that smells like a chaotic mix of delicious spices and stinging, acrid smoke.
Rough, handheld lights mounted to the stone that flicker unsteadily and cast long, dancing shadows.

rooms.name: The Greasy Hallway
rooms.longDesc: The stone floor here is coated in a layer of slippery, translucent grease. Footprints—some booted, some clawed—are stamped into the grime, leading further into the complex. The walls are lined with pegs holding aprons that have seen better days.

details.desc: The stone is barely visible beneath a thick, oily sheen that looks incredibly hazardous to walk on.
A messy trail of heavy boot prints and sharp, three-toed claw marks tells a story of busy, frantic traffic.
Rough wooden spikes are driven into the masonry to hold various cooking implements and garments.
These tattered stained cloths are stiff with dried animal fat and mystery sauces.
The air is heavy with the scent of rancid lard and old sweat.
Every step you take results in a wet, squelching sound against the slick stone.

monsters.long: A kobold wearing a floppy white hat is here, trying to balance a stack of plates.

rooms.name: Prep Station Alpha
rooms.longDesc: This room is a chaotic scene of culinary violence. Several low wooden tables are covered in vegetable peelings and hacked-up meat. A large chalkboard on the wall displays the 'Special of the Day'. To the west lies a storage area, and north leads to the main heat.

details.desc: Low, scarred surfaces that are currently groaning under the weight of food scraps and butchered parts.

details.keywords: vegetable peelings, hacked-up meat, peelings, meat
details.desc: A gory and messy heap of raw ingredients that have been brutally chopped with little regard for precision.
A slate board covered in white dust that proudly announces the kitchen's current offering.
The scrawled text reads: 'STIR-FRIED INVADER WITH MUSHROOM GRAVY'.
The air reeks of raw blood, earthy roots, and the metallic tang of sharpened steel.
Dark shelves loom in the shadows to the west, stacked with mysterious crates.
A warm glow and waves of heat emanate from the passageway to the north.

rooms.name: The Green Pantry
rooms.longDesc: Shelves line the walls of this damp alcove, stacked high with crates of questionable ingredients. A barrel in the corner is buzzing with activity. The air is thick with the scent of mold and decay, which the inhabitants seem to mistake for 'aging'.

details.desc: Warped wooden planks sagging dangerously under the weight of too many supplies.
Rough boxes overflowing with slimy roots, withered herbs, and unidentifiable dried chunks.
A rotting cask that seems to be vibrating slightly on its own.
An angry, droning hum emanates from within the barrel, suggesting a swarm of something unpleasant.
A heavy, damp stench that tastes almost fuzzy on the tongue, reminiscent of rotting leaves and stagnant water.

monsters.long: A massive cockroach skitters over the food crates.

rooms.name: The Deep Freezer
rooms.longDesc: The temperature drops significantly here. This dead-end room is where they keep the meat cold. Blocks of ice, dragged from who-knows-where, are piled around carcasses hanging from rusty hooks.

details.desc: Massive, semi-transparent slabs that are slowly dripping onto the stone floor.
Pale, stiff bodies of various creatures suspended in the chill air, waiting for the cleaver.
Jagged iron spikes that look dangerously fragile under the weight of the frozen meat.
A frosty chamber where your breath immediately turns into white puffs of mist.
The air is crisp and sharp, smelling of copper, frost, and congealed blood.
The silence is broken only by the slow, rhythmic dripping of melting ice.

rooms.name: The Inferno Kitchen
rooms.longDesc: The heat here is intense. A massive fire pit dominates the center of the room, over which a cauldron the size of a bathtub bubbles menacingly. Kobolds scurry back and forth, throwing strange powders into the fire, causing it to flare with green and purple flames.

details.keywords: fire pit, fire, flames, green flames, purple flames
details.desc: A roaring blaze that dances with unnatural green and purple hues, licking the bottom of the iron vessel.
A gargantuan iron vessel bubbling with a thick, ominous liquid that threatens to boil over.
Small, frantic background figures that seem more concerned with the pyrotechnics than the actual cooking.
Mysterious granular substances that spark and hiss violently upon contact with the heat.
Waves of blistering heat wash over you, carrying smells of sulfur, charcoal, and burnt hair.
The room is filled with the roar of the fire, the wet bubbling of the pot, and the frantic patter of bare feet.

monsters.long: A kobold in robes stained with gravy chants over the pot.
A nervous kobold chops onions here.

rooms.name: The Scullery
rooms.longDesc: To the east of the kitchen lies the scullery, where dishes go to die. Piles of dirty plates reach precariously toward the ceiling. The floor is awash with soapy, grey water that hides tripping hazards.

details.desc: Teetering towers of ceramic encrusted with the hardened remains of previous meals.

details.keywords: floor, water, soapy water, grey water
details.desc: A shallow, murky lake of lukewarm suds that obscures whatever debris lies beneath.
You cannot see them through the grey sludge, but hard, sharp shapes lurk just below the surface.
The room smells of harsh lye soap mixed with the sour tang of rotting leftovers.
You hear the constant sloshing of liquid and the nerve-wracking rattle of the unstable crockery towers.

monsters.long: A blob of animated grease and soap residue wobbles here.

rooms.name: The Dining Hall
rooms.longDesc: This cavernous room is filled with long, uneven tables. The etiquette here is non-existent. Bones are thrown on the floor, and drinks are spilled freely. The noise of chewing and burping is deafening. To the north sits a slightly raised platform.

details.desc: Rough-hewn furniture that is stained, battered, and currently buried under a layer of culinary debris.
The ground is a crunching carpet of gnawed ribs and discarded femurs mixed with puddles of sticky liquid.
A wooden dais elevated slightly above the filth, presumably reserved for those strong enough to demand a clean seat.
A cacophony of wet smacking lips, loud belches, and the clatter of tankards echoes off the stone walls.
The atmosphere is thick with the aroma of cheap ale, roasted meat, and unwashed bodies.

monsters.long: A fat kobold sits here, banging a fork on the table.
A fat kobold sits here, chewing on a bone.

rooms.name: The High Table
rooms.longDesc: Raised above the common rabble, this platform hosts a single, ornate table covered in a relatively clean tablecloth. A heavy iron door stands to the east, marked 'PRIVATE'.

details.desc: A surprisingly civilized dining setup that stands in stark contrast to the filth below.
A formidable metal barrier that bars the way to whatever the leadership wants to keep hidden.
The word is deeply embossed in the iron, warning away anyone foolish enough to approach.
From this height, the eating area below looks like a swarming pit of hungry rats.
The air is fresher here, though faint whiffs of the grease pit below still drift up.
The deafening roar of chewing and fighting is slightly muted at this elevation.

monsters.long: A tall kobold in a tuxedo painted onto his chest stands guard.

rooms.name: Chef Ramsey-Snout's Office
rooms.longDesc: This room is shockingly organized compared to the rest of the cave. Cookbooks are stacked in neat piles, and a collection of sharp knives hangs on the wall. A large desk sits in the center, behind which the Head Chef plots his next culinary disaster.

details.desc: Leather-bound volumes with ominous titles like '101 Ways to Serve Dwarf' and 'Sauces from the Sewer'.
Gleaming blades ranging from small paring knives to massive cleavers, all kept disturbingly clean and sharp.
A heavy oak surface covered in ink-stained notes and what looks like a blueprint for a wedding cake made of meat.
The unnatural orderliness makes you feel like you've stepped into the eye of a greasy storm.
The air smells of dry paper, ink, and the metallic oil used to maintain the blades.
It is unnervingly quiet here, standing in sharp contrast to the din of the kitchen outside.

monsters.long: The Head Chef stands here, wielding a giant ladle and frothing at the mouth.

objectLibrary.long: A massive iron ladle stained with soup lies here.
A poofy white hat that smells of flour.
A limp, fuzzy carrot lies on the ground.
A rock-hard piece of frozen meat.
A small iron key covered in lard.
A piece of bread so stale it could crack a skull.
